scripts.init: rm -rf hexo && npx hexo init hexo  && rm -f hexo/source/_posts/hello-world.md && cp -rf my_hexo/* hexo && cd hexo && npm install hexo-theme-next && npm install hexo-deployer-git && npm install hexo-generator-sitemap --save && npm install hexo-deployer-git && npm install hexo-deployer-rsync
scripts.deploy: cp -rf ../articles/* hexo/source/_posts && mv hexo/source/_posts/img hexo/source/img && hexo g --cwd hexo && hexo d --cwd hexo/
